title: A United Kingdom
creator_credit: Film United, Perfect Weekend, Harbinger Pictures, BFI Film Fund, Yoruba Saxon Productions and Pathé
headline_credit: Czech Republic, France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016
brief_description: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments.

constellations_other.name: Royals
constellations_other.description: Royal watchers don't need to visit palaces around the world. There are enough stories about royalty on the silver and small screen to get their fix.

creator_credit_for_label: Film United, Perfect Weekend, Harbinger Pictures, BFI Film Fund, Yoruba Saxon Productions and Pathé
headline_credit_for_label: Czech Republic, France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016
description: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments. Seretse and Ruth defied family, Apartheid and empire - their love triumphed over every obstacle flung in their path and in so doing they transformed their nation and inspired the world.
description_for_label: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments. Seretse and Ruth defied family, Apartheid and empire - their love triumphed over every obstacle flung in their path and in so doing they transformed their nation and inspired the world.
